term.title: fertile

item.text: Of a nuclide: capable of being transformed, directly or indirectly, into a fissilenuclide by neutroncapture
Containing one or more fertile nuclides.

term.sources: 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' De Bruin, M.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1982 54(8) 1533
